name: Empty Space (TonySaysHi)
description:
A GameJam for both the MiniJam 98 : Empty and the Trijam #153 simply because the timeframe and themes where the same for both. This is also my third gamejam application  so feel free to write your critiques in the comments. If you find any bugs please also write a comment, I do want to somewhat fresh out this tiny project of mine.

This is a space shooter where at the end of every 3 round you get to choose what to fill the void with. At round 15 there's a big boss if you are up for the challenge.

There will be a audio update in the near future if not already done.

Special Thanks to David Malenfant for the audio and for helping with brainstorming game ideas.

Controls :

WASD to move the ship.

Mouse Left Click to choose between the upgrades.

Here are the links for all asset used :

Font :

https://heraldod.itch.io/bitmap-fonts

Explosions : 

https://like100bears.itch.io/bearfx-explosions

Ui , Player and ennemies :

https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/space-shooter-1-5280/

Bullets :

https://wenrexa.itch.io/laser2020/

Background :

https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator

https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator
